content.stimulus_en: We (stay) ________ in a small guest house.
They (visit) ________ all the museums.
The flight (be) ________ very long.
Did you ________ (buy) any souvenirs?
I (lose) ________ my map in the city center.
She (take) ________ the wrong train.
I bought a beautiful souvenir for my sister.
The from view the top of the mountain was amazing.
The journey took more than ten hours.
We many met interesting people during our trip.
Don't forget to pack your passport.
We sightseeing went in the old town.
